articles.author: Joyce Yang
articles.title: The 21-day bitcoin challenge
articles.description: There is a documentary series currently airing on iQiyi, China’s Netflix equivalent, about a Chinese bitcoin enthusiast who attempts to survive 21 days by merely living on 0.21 bitcoin, or $1,300, without any help or donations. He You Bing is traveling and ca…

articles.author: Danny Crichton
articles.title: The second blockchain bubble is now complete – what’s next?
articles.description: The last few months haven’t been easy for crypto investors. Following the dizzying highs of crypto trading late last year, which saw Bitcoin reach a peak of $19,276 and a market cap of $323 billion and Ether reach $1,152 with a market cap of more than $112 bi…
